text: The 1987 Men's Hockey Champions Trophy was the ninth edition of the Hockey Champions Trophy for men. The tournament was held from 19–28 June 1987, in Amstelveen, Netherlands. West Germany won the tournament for the second time. Netherlands and Australia finished in second and third place, respectively. ==Participating nations== * * * * * * * * ==Results== ===Pool standings=== ===Matches=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- == References== C C 1987 Category:Champions Trophy (field hockey)
title: 1987 Men's Hockey Champions Trophy
